Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires the division of housing and community renewal to publish an updated schedule of rent adjustments for all rent-stabilized units converted from master utility metering to individual utility metering
Summary: Requires the division of housing and community renewal to, within six months of each New York City housing and vacancy survey, publish an updated schedule of rent adjustments for all rent-stabilized units converted from master utility metering to individual utility metering; allows owners of buildings which are master metered for electricity and have rent inclusion of electricity to file applications to terminate the rent inclusion of electricity for such accommodations.
LawCode: Amd §§26-511 & 26-405, NYC Ad Cd; amd §6, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §4, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the emergency housing rent control law, in relation to requiring the division of housing and community renewal to, within six months of each New York city housing and vacancy survey, publish an updated schedule of rent adjustments for all rent-stabilized units converted from master utility metering to individual utility metering
